title: Student Membership Drive 2019 | 2020 Renewal Cycle
description: Annual Student Membership Drive was held on 2019 â€“ 22nd October to educate NITK student fraternity about the benefits of taking up IEEE Membership and what NITK IEEE Student Branch has in store for the students. A membership development stall was set up and goodies were distributed. This year saw an increase in number of student members who signed up for IEEE membership from NITK.
